title: Maternity waiting home utilization among women who gave birth in the pastoralist communities of Borana Zone, Ethiopia: A community-based mixed-method study design
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Tura Muda Boru, Eden Girmaye Tefera, Gizachew Abdissa Bulto, Yonas Sagni Doba, Negash Wakgari, Ephrem Yohannes Roga, Gemechu Ganfure, Gonfa Moti Geda, Maru Mossisa Erena
